title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Collaboration-Based Evidence Reliability Assessment Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate scientific evidence from diverse sources based on three or more credibility criteria (author expertise, data transparency, peer review).
Learners can document evidence-based decision-making processes and create presentation materials in a collaborative learning environment.
Learners can write evidence evaluation reports on complex socio-scientific issues, such as genetically modified crops, and incorporate feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
